user: What is the main focus of ByteDance's products
bot:
The main focus of ByteDance's products appears to be social media and entertainment. Their flagship platform, TikTok, allows users to create and share short-form videos, often set to music or other audio. This has made TikTok extremely popular among younger generations.

ByteDance also owns other popular platforms such as Douyin (similar to TikTok but only available in China), News Republic, and Vigo Video.

Their AI technology, such as OmniHuman-1, is also focused on creating realistic human videos from images and motion signals.
